titleStmt.title: Commonwealth of Kentucky v. Taylor Roberts and Anna G. Roberts, Indictment
CWG9699

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Beriah Magoffin: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Petitions for Pardons and Remissions, 1859-1862

body.p:
Trimble circuit Court
Commonwealth of Kentucky, Pl'ff,
Against } Indictment for Murder
Taylor Roberts & Anna G. Roberts Def'ts

The Grand Jury of Trimble County in the name and by the authority of the commonwealth of Kentucky accuse Taylor Roberts and Annie G Roberts of the crime of murder. Committed as follows, viz: The Said Taylor Roberts and Annie G. Roberts in the county aforesaid on the 1st day of March 1858 did feloniously willfully and of their malice aforethought kill and murder Nancy Gardener by wilfully and maliciously giving and administering to her Arsenic and another corrosive and destructive poison from the effects of which She then and their died contrary to the statute and, Against the peace and dignity of the commonwealth of Kentucky
J. Y. Newkirk, Jno Roberts, Martin Roberts, Mrs A. Overton, Mrs C Falkner Mrs Jane Conway Jno Moffit I Mayfield Dr Ely Dr Joseph Rodgers Sr Dr Joseph Rodgers jr W. A Collins

I William Samuel clerk of the county & circuit court hereby certify that the foregoing is a true copy of an Indictment against Taylor Roberts & Annie Roberts at the November term of the Trimble circuit court given under my hand this 13th day of Dec 1860

William Samuel Clerk
By G. W. Teague D. C.

Commonwealth
vs } Indictment for murder
Taylor Roberts & Anna G Roberts
A True Bill
C C Holmes Foreman
